pcs 0.0.0.9000

    • A worked example with `pcs`

Main PCS scraping function

Source: R/query_pcs.R
query_pcs.Rd

query_pcs scrapes PCS data (rider profiles and results) for a given vector of rider names.

query_pcs(rider_names, seasons = NULL)

Arguments

rider_names

Character vector containing one or more rider names.
seasons

Integer vector of years ("seasons") to collect results from. Will return all years if NULL.

Value

List of two data frames (profiles and results).

Examples


# race results for two riders in the 2021 season
query_pcs(c("Peter Sagan","Adam Yates"), seasons = 2021)

#> Peter Sagan
#> Peter Sagan 2021
#> Adam Yates
#> Adam Yates 2021
#> $profiles
#> # A tibble: 2 x 12
#>   rider   dob        nationality  pob   current_team weight height one_day_races
#>   <chr>   <date>     <chr>        <chr> <chr>         <dbl>  <dbl>         <dbl>
#> 1 Adam Y… 1992-08-07 Great Brita… ""    INEOS Grena…     58   1.73          1289
#> 2 Peter … 1990-01-26 Slovakia     "Žil… BORA - hans…     78   1.84          9095
#> # … with 4 more variables: gc <dbl>, tt <dbl>, sprint <dbl>, climber <dbl>
#> 
#> $results
#> # A tibble: 68 x 10
#>    date                result gc_result_on_sta… race          distance pointspcs
#>    <dttm>               <dbl>             <int> <chr>            <dbl>     <int>
#>  1 2021-04-25 00:00:00     18                NA Liège-Bastog…     259.        24
#>  2 2021-04-21 00:00:00     20                NA La Flèche Wa…     194.        15
#>  3 NA                      13                NA Itzulia Basq…      NA         NA
#>  4 NA                       7                NA Itzulia Basq…      NA         NA
#>  5 NA                       4                NA Itzulia Basq…      NA        140
#>  6 2021-04-10 00:00:00      4                NA Itzulia Basq…     112.        13
#>  7 2021-04-09 00:00:00     53                 6 Itzulia Basq…     160.        NA
#>  8 2021-04-08 00:00:00     25                 6 Itzulia Basq…     189.        NA
#>  9 2021-04-07 00:00:00      4                 4 Itzulia Basq…     168.        13
#> 10 2021-04-06 00:00:00     13                 5 Itzulia Basq…     155.        NA
#> # … with 58 more rows, and 4 more variables: pointsuci <int>, stage <chr>,
#> #   rider <chr>, team <chr>
#> 

# two riders, two seasons
query_pcs(c("Peter Sagan","Adam Yates"), seasons = c(2020,2021))

#> Peter Sagan
#> Peter Sagan 2021
#> Peter Sagan 2020
#> Adam Yates
#> Adam Yates 2021
#> Adam Yates 2020
#> $profiles
#> # A tibble: 2 x 12
#>   rider   dob        nationality  pob   current_team weight height one_day_races

#> 2 Peter … 1990-01-26 Slovakia     "Žil… BORA - hans…     78   1.84          9095
#> # … with 4 more variables: gc <dbl>, tt <dbl>, sprint <dbl>, climber <dbl>
#> 
#> $results
#> # A tibble: 176 x 10
#>    date                result gc_result_on_sta… race          distance pointspcs
#>    <dttm>               <dbl>             <int> <chr>            <dbl>     <int>
#>  1 2021-04-25 00:00:00     18                NA Liège-Bastog…     259.        24
#>  2 2021-04-21 00:00:00     20                NA La Flèche Wa…     194.        15

#>  4 NA                       7                NA Itzulia Basq…      NA         NA

#>  7 2021-04-09 00:00:00     53                 6 Itzulia Basq…     160.        NA
#>  8 2021-04-08 00:00:00     25                 6 Itzulia Basq…     189.        NA

# two riders, all seasons
query_pcs(c("Peter Sagan","Adam Yates"))

#> Peter Sagan
#> Peter Sagan 2021
#> Peter Sagan 2020
#> Peter Sagan 2019
#> Peter Sagan 2018
#> Peter Sagan 2017
